laboratory_examinations.findings: Innumerable small gallstones within gallbladder lumen; 0.3 cm stone in the very distal common bile duct; borderline common bile duct diameter 0.7 cm; gallbladder not dilated; mild linear gallbladder wall enhancement, suggestive of chronic or very early acute cholecystitis.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Images are moderately compromised by motion.
